translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Since the cattle have not yet been delivered to Major Faria by Your Excellency Rafael Teixeira Marins, my previous orders regarding the delivery of the same to the said Major Faria are hereby rendered null and void.

State Secretariat of Finance Affairs in Piratini, January 28, 1839.

(a) Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Colonel João Antônio da Silveira. Commander of the Right Division.
